文献ID: STP458-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_1st Volume_017_chunk5
证据片段: A strain-limit approach has been developed for the design of coldworked Zircaloy-2 pressure tubes. On the present evidence a 2 percent creep limit is recommended.

文献ID: STP458-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_1st Volume_017_chunk5
证据片段: Under the service conditions of stress, temperature, and flux, the pressure tubes of an SGHW reactor will creep 2 percent in 30 yr at 75 percent load factor.

证据片段: Torsion tests were performed as part of a study of the effects of texture on the biaxial plastic properties of Zircaloy tubing.
